summary: The Assassin from the east is ready to join you on you adventures through Skyrim Dovahkiin!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/TESV2012-08-1812-00-34-36.jpg[/img]

[heading][color=red]Kunoichi Kariin Ayame The Assassin From The East[/color][/heading]

Well It is finally here, the Lunari you liked so much Kariin, the Assassin from the east is ready to join you on you adventures through Skyrim! 

This unique Companion/Follower is equipped with not only looks that kill, but her two blades Masamune and Kikuichimonji as well.(Actual weapons and skins/textures for them \'COMNGSOON\' Armor too d;^) )

She is as fast and swift as a Master Assassin, adept in one handed weapons, light armor, and stealth and her skills grow, along with yours.

You can find her at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun

[b]I apologize for the low quality pictures, I\'m having problems with ENBseries causing Skyrim CTDs

And also apologies again if she is not looking like expected, NPC FaceGen and Player FaceGen are different, this is how Kariin looks as NPC sorry if you do not like d=^([/b]
[img=center]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/KunoichiKariinCompanion.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22506/]Beautiful Skyrim - Unreal Cinema - ENB[/url] by Unreal Warfare
/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / 
[font=impact][color=yellow]Mods Required:[/color][/font]
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602]Lunari Race mod[/url] by bhaktisean

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii

3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url] by lojack

4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility.esm[/url] by expired6978

[img=center]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/KunoichiKariinCompanion3.jpg[/img]
[font=impact][color=yellow]INSTALLATION:[/color][/font]
1. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602]Lunari Race Mod[/url] by bhaktisean 

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii

3. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url] by lojack To Skyrim Directory, Configure to load your Skyrim data folder.

4. Download RacialCompatibility.esm found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10165

5. Run Wrye Bash, locate LunariRace.esp, right click and choose \'Copy to esm\'. There should now be two Lunari files, you only need one of these active, make sure that only the Lunari.esm is checked, leave the .esp unchecked and close Wrye Bash.

6. Download using NMM or manually and Extract the KariineAyameCompanion.esp to your Skyrim Data folder

7. Launch Skyrim using NMM or your preferred modloader make sure the load order for your mods is as follows:
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm(optional)
RacialCompatibility.esm
Lunari.esm
KariinAyameCompanion.esp
...etc

8. Got to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun to meet Kariin and start your journeys together!
[img=center]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u430/EvaNix41/KunoichiKariinCompanion2.jpg[/img]
Any questions, concerns, confusions. Let me know.
Be sure to comment, endorse if you like, and post your own pictures, I love to see them all.
/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
[font=impact]Thank you all for your support![/font]

[font=impact]Keep checking back here for updates and upcoming mods in the future![/font]

[font=impact][color=yellow]Optional mods/Mods used in screenshots:[/color][/font]
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting[/url] by JJC71

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/866]ReAL Sun - insane0h Realistic Sunglare[/url] by sval

3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22506/]Beautiful Skyrim - Unreal Cinema - ENB[/url] by Unreal Warfare

4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16919]Project Parallax - Whiterun[/url] by Osmodius

5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One[/url] by MannyGT

6. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8058#content]Open Cities Skyrim[/url] by Arthmoor

7. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM[/url] by Brumbek

[font=impact][color=yellow]SPECIAL THANKS[/color][/font]

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1854067-bhaktisean/][b]bhaktisean[/url], for creating without you this mod not only would have been impossible, but I wouldn\'t have even gotten the inspiration to begin modding. Many thanks to you my friend.[/b]

[b]To [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/3225785-noblesse00/]Noblesse00[/url] and [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1778859-sonnybur/]sonnybur[/url] for helping me out when I needed it most. This mod couldn\'t have been finished without your help

Many thanks to all of you modders out there who do what you do, everyone in this awesome community for your support and motivation to keep going, and to the creators of this fine site we all all the Nexus, you guys are amazing![/b]
author: EvaNix - EvaNixia Mods
